Happy Grandy

The digital ecosystem for more connected elderly

Tell Me More

Concept

HappyGrandy delivers an all-in-one solution for elderly to improve social interaction and provide direct access to health caregivers

Elderly

Upgrade their existing TV to enable video-calling on a big screen from their couch, with a hassle-free user interface.

Health caregivers

In direct contact with elderly, providing more efficient access to a larger segment of the elderly population.

AI coach

Our AI-based solution tracks exercises done by elderly at home, gives feedback and stimulates self-encouragement.
